title: Unstable LP Gain/Loss Ratio?
body:
Hello
I'm Concerned about the LP win/loss ratio. is it bugged or normal to be constantly losing more LP than to gain?
 eg played  4 games  won 3/4 to  gain a total of 42 LP and lost twice after and lost 42LP.

Please Provide FeedBack to clarify this Endless Tragedy.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
As always GL & HF on the Rift!

replies.body:
In a nutshell, there is a hidden number behind each queue you play, and soon there will be a number behind individual roles as well. This number is referred to as MMR, or Match Making Rating. This number is adjusted as you win and lose matches, and is calculated based on a comparison of the numbers of your teammates and your enemies. If your MMR is lower than what is normal for your rank, you may see yourself in a situation where you'll lose more LP than you win; conversely, as you rack up a win streak, you may see your MMR gains higher than your losses. In order to raise your MMR, you'll need to consistently win most of your matches, so keep up the climb!

You can read more about the Matchmaking system here:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide
